title: Canada bans 'conversion therapy,' threatens therapists with prison
content:
1. Canada bans 'conversion therapy,' threatens therapists with prison  New York Post
  2. Canada bans conversion therapy, a practice Trudeau calls 'despicable and degrading'  CNN
  3. After two failed attempts, Canada bans conversion therapy  NPR
  4. Canada bans conversion therapy, telling LGBTQ residents 'we'll always stand up for you'  USA TODAY
  5. Canada outlaws discredited LGBTQ 'conversion therapy' practices  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: カナダは「コンバージョン・セラピー」を禁止し、セラピストを刑務所に送ると脅しています。
